con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://services.trustvesta.com/MobilityUS_Service/Service">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ser:ActDelayOrderPrepareWithNewCardRequest>\r <!--You may enter the following 15 items in any order-->\r <ser:SessionKey>?</ser:SessionKey>\r <ser:ChargeAccountNumber>?</ser:ChargeAccountNumber>\r <ser:ChargeExpirationMMYY>?</ser:ChargeExpirationMMYY>\r <ser:CustomerFirstName>?</ser:CustomerFirstName>\r <ser:CustomerLastName>?</ser:CustomerLastName>\r <ser:CustomerEmailAddress>?</ser:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <ser:CustomerAddressLine1>?</ser:CustomerAddressLine1>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:CustomerAddressLine2>?</ser:CustomerAddressLine2>\r <ser:CustomerCity>?</ser:CustomerCity>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:CustomerRegion>?</ser:CustomerRegion>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:CustomerPostalCode>?</ser:CustomerPostalCode>\r <ser:CustomerCountry>?</ser:CustomerCountry>\r <ser:DeliveryTypeCD>?</ser:DeliveryTypeCD>\r <ser:ConsentAgreementID>?</ser:ConsentAgreementID>\r <ser:ActDelayOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItemsRows>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:ActDelayOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItems>\r <!--You may enter the following 3 items in any order-->\r <ser:Amount>?</ser:Amount>\r <ser:ProductTypeCD>?</ser:ProductTypeCD>\r <ser:ProductCode>?</ser:ProductCode>\r </ser:ActDelayOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItems>\r </ser:ActDelayOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItemsRows>\r </ser:ActDelayOrderPrepareWithNewCardRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
